newsitem.title: USA: Chyron names Grebow president and CEO.
newsitem.headline: Chyron names Grebow president and CEO.

text.p: Chyron Corp said Monday it had named Edward Grebow president and chief executive officer, with a position on the board of directors.
Grebow was previously president of TELE-TV Systems, a new media and technology joint venture of Bell Atlantic Corp, Pacific Telesis Group and NYNEX Corp.
At Chyron he succeeds Michael Wellesley-Wesley as CEO and Isaac Hersly as president.
Wellesley-Wesley, who resigned as CEO to devote time to other business interests, will remain with Chyron as a director and non-executive chairman of the board.
Hersly will continue to serve Chyron as a director and as president of Chyron Graphics.
